attributes.action: Do not ban end-to-end encryption - Remain free from oppression
attributes.additional_details:
Trying to monitor a communication service that *could* be used by terrorists will not stop them from communicating, they will simply use another service or create their own encrypted service.

This is a trick to fool the members of our society who do not understand why encryption is essential in remain free from Nazi like surveillance that is possible without.

Reflex policies like this cannot and will not be tolerated, before long a Bill of Rights must be set in place to maintain the greatest asset to humanity and the freest form of information - The Internet.
